group_1.textRight: What happened?

group_1.textLeft: Th-this is...
Tamaki...this is serious...@Look at this...!
Eh?!@D-did something happen...?
It's...a kite, right...?@Ah...but it's much older than the rest...

group_1.textRight: Judging by the name of the square seal stamped@on this kite...
This may very well be...from the Edo period.

group_1.textLeft: Uhh...@Eh?! The Edo period...?

group_1.textRight: In the Edo period, there was a time when kite flying@got a surge in popularity...
It's possible, though...@If this square seal is in fact genuine,
I believe it may have been gifted to this shrine@by a great person long ago.
This square seal belonged to a feudal lord@in this region.
Y-you mean...

group_1.textLeft: This is too historically valuable@to be flying in the sky!
T-this is bad!

group_1.textRight: We need to take it to the shrine right now!
Yeah, that would be for the best.
Ah, but be careful while moving it!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, please leave it to us!
Ah, and there's no need for everyone to worry,@so please enjoy yourselves.
EEEHHH~~~?!
THIS KITE WAS A GIFT FROM SOME BIG SHOT@FROM THE EDO PERIOD?!

group_1.textRight: A friend of mine who is well-acquainted@with history told me that...

group_1.textLeft: This crest...@I'm certain I've seen it before...

group_1.textRight: While I was carrying it here... I thought my heart@was going to jump out of my chest...

group_1.textLeft: But, for something like that to get mixed in@with the kite flying competition rentals...
Such a precious thing needs to be on display here...[chara:800100:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800100:cheek_0][chara:800100:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:800100:lipSynch_1:mouthOpen_1]@Ah.
A totally different kite is being proudly displayed@here...

group_1.textRight: W-what does this mean...

group_1.textLeft: I'll call someone from the shrine and confirm.

group_1.textRight: How did it go?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, this kite you just brought definitely seems@to have historic value.
They found the string was frayed and sent it@to be mended,
but in the meantime, the kite currently on display@had arrived and was put there by mistake.

group_1.textRight: To get mixed up like that...

group_1.textLeft: Well, the girl that first received it@was also just a helper,
so she didn't know that.
On top of that, this kite on display was also a gift,@but from a local big name.

group_1.textRight: Mutual gifts... It must be confusing if you're not@familiar with them.

group_1.textLeft: Even I misunderstood.
When that old kite was later returned,
I put it with the others because I thought it was@a rental.

group_1.textRight: It's so busy around the New Year, isn't it?@It's difficult...

group_1.textLeft: It is. It's bad because the management system here@never seems to change...
Thank you both!
I'll report all of this to the priest again.
Please, give your history-loving friend our gratitude.

group_1.textRight: Sure!
Ah, I'll take this kite over to the grounds.
It looks like it was originally meant for@the competition.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, please do!
Ah, that's right.

group_1.textRight: Was there something else?

group_1.textLeft: It's a newly gifted kite, but...
Since it's a special kite that will be displayed@for the finale,
be careful when carrying it.

group_1.textRight: Carefully, carefully, Sis.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, suddenly there's...a ton of pressure on me...

group_1.textRight: S-sorry...
...But, this is a really huge kite...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's pretty big.

group_1.textRight: People could fly on top of it.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I think I've seen something like that on TV.

group_1.textRight: Sis, this is...

group_1.textLeft: A Witch's Labyrinth...?!@At a time like this?!

group_1.textRight: The kite, what do we do...

group_1.textLeft: We can't just leave it lying around...
We have no choice but to go like this...!

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah...!
